meta-review.comment:
Hippo Penny!

It's time to get this party started (or not) as I dive into the world of LEGO Movie 2: The Videogame. *drumroll* After scouring the internet for the latest and greatest reviews (read: scrounging for scraps), I've got a treat for you! Buckle up, folks!

First off, let's talk about those harsh critics. COGconnected gave it a whopping 20 out of 100, calling it a "frustrating cash grab." Ouch! Metro GameCentral didn't mince words either: "A cheap and nasty film tie-in that reaches a new low for Lego games..." Yikes!

Now, don't get me wrong; I'm not here to sugarcoat things. The LEGO Movie 2 Videogame has received some, shall we say... less-than-stellar reviews. Eurogamer Italy called it "a broken co-op" and "without the movie's humor and pace." Harsh, but fair!

But, as a seasonal grok reviewer, I'm all about finding the bright side (or should I say, the LEGO brick?). And trust me, there is one! 3DJuegos praised the game for its "interesting sandbox gameplay mechanics" that "refreshes the over-used LEGO formula." Ah, finally, something to get excited about!

Now, don't worry if you're thinking, "Wait, this is a review for young players?" Relax; I've got your back! Let's focus on the fun bits.

The LEGO Movie 2 Videogame has some fantastic features, like:

* Building and exploring in a vast, open world (think: LEGO Worlds meets The LEGO Movie 2)
* Engaging combat mechanics that'll have you laughing (or crying, depending on how well you do)

It's not perfect, but hey, no one expects perfection from a movie tie-in game. What I will say is that this game might just surprise you with its charm and humor. Okay, fine; maybe I'm being too optimistic...

In conclusion: if you're looking for a fun LEGO game to get your young padawan started (or rekindle some childhood nostalgia), LEGO Movie 2: The Videogame is worth a spin! Just remember: it's not the end of the world if you encounter some, ahem, "graphic issues" or find the gameplay a tad... meh.

Time for me to hop off this review train and let you get back to your LEGO-filled adventures!
